title: 哥帥︰球場無人不如唔好踢啦

replies.msg:
“You have to ask whether it is worth playing football without the spectators,” the Manchester City manager said. “It doesn’t make any sense to play professional football without the people, because they are the ones we do it for, but obviously we are going to follow the instructions we are given.

“I would prefer not to play games without people watching, but clearly health is the most important thing, not the competition. I do think playing games behind close doors is going to happen here, but just one or two games, maybe. No longer than that.”
深夜波真係會睇得好辛苦
鏝主場emptihad咪又係冇人
真
依家係咪串智利工程師
係就好 今季冠軍懸空
你輸到仆街梗係唔想踢啦
agger
你都慣主場無人架啦

當年亞視台慶無觀眾未一樣照做
啲壽包掉向空櫈

quote.msg: 鏝主場emptihad咪又係冇人

replies.msg:
9th | Liverpool
Capacity: 54,074
Average: 53,118
Capacity percentage: 98.2%

Liverpool may have won all 11 matches at home this season but they’re only ninth in the capacity percentage table. A 3-1 win against Man City has been the highlight. They've sold out every home game but season ticket holders appear to have missed a few matches.

8th | Manchester City
Capacity: 55,017
Average: 54.386
Capacity percentage: 98.9%

The Emptyhad? We don’t think so.

City are usually unbeatable at home in the league but Wolves and Man Utd have already come away from the Etihad with all three points.

https://www.google.com.hk/amp/s/www.givemesport.com/1537005-ranking-how-full-each-premier-league-stadium-has-been-this-season%3famp

多撚過利物浦呀傻閪

9th | Liverpool
Capacity: 54,074

Liverpool may have won all 11 matches at home this season but they’re only ninth in the capacity percentage table. A 3-1 win against Man City has been the highlight. They've sold out every home game but season ticket holders appear to have missed a few matches.

8th | Manchester City
Capacity: 55,017
Average: 54.386
Capacity percentage: 98.9%

City are usually unbeatable at home in the league but Wolves and Man Utd have already come away from the Etihad with all three points.
